display_html: type CompileError uni fun ann = WithContext Text (Error uni fun ann)
name: CompileError

display_html:
data Error uni fun a
  • = PLCError !(Error uni fun a)
  • | PIRError !(Error uni fun (Provenance a))
  • | CompilationError !Text
  • | UnsupportedError !Text
  • | FreeVariableError !Text
  • | InvalidMarkerError !String
  • | CoreNameLookupError !Name
name: Error FreeVariableError CompilationError UnsupportedError PLCError PIRError InvalidMarkerError CoreNameLookupError

display_html:
data WithContext c e
  • = NoContext e
  • | WithContextC Int c (WithContext c e)
name: WithContext NoContext WithContextC

display_html: withContext ∷ MonadError (WithContext c e) m ⇒ Int → c → m a → m a
name: withContext

display_html: withContextM ∷ MonadError (WithContext c e) m ⇒ Int → m c → m a → m a
name: withContextM

display_html: throwPlain ∷ MonadError (WithContext c e) m ⇒ e → m a
name: throwPlain

display_html: pruneContext ∷ Int → WithContext c e → WithContext c e
name: pruneContext

display_html: type PIRKind = Kind Ann
name: PIRKind

display_html: type PIRType uni = Type TyName uni Ann
name: PIRType

display_html: type PIRTerm uni fun = Term TyName Name uni fun Ann
name: PIRTerm

display_html: type PIRProgram uni fun = Program TyName Name uni fun SrcSpans
name: PIRProgram

display_html: type PIRBinding uni fun = Binding TyName Name uni fun Ann
name: PIRBinding

display_html: type PIRVar uni = VarDecl TyName Name uni Ann
name: PIRVar

display_html: type PIRTyVar = TyVarDecl TyName Ann
name: PIRTyVar

display_html: type PLCKind = Kind Ann
name: PLCKind

display_html: type PLCType uni = Type TyName uni Ann
name: PLCType

display_html: type PLCTerm uni fun = Term TyName Name uni fun Ann
name: PLCTerm

display_html: type PLCProgram uni fun = Program TyName Name uni fun ()
name: PLCProgram

display_html: type PLCVar uni = VarDecl TyName Name uni Ann
name: PLCVar

display_html: type PLCTyVar = TyVarDecl TyName Ann
name: PLCTyVar

display_html: type UPLCProgram uni fun = Program NamedDeBruijn uni fun SrcSpans
name: UPLCProgram

display_html: type UPLCTerm uni fun = Term NamedDeBruijn uni fun SrcSpans
name: UPLCTerm

display_html: data Scope uni fun = Scope (Map Name (PLCVar uni, Maybe (PIRTerm uni fun))) (Map Name PLCTyVar)
name: Scope Scope

display_html:
data Verbosity
  • = Quiet
  • | Verbose
  • | Debug
name: Verbosity Debug Quiet Verbose

display_html: type Compiling uni fun m ann = (MonadError (CompileError uni fun ann) m, MonadQuote m, MonadReader (CompileContext uni fun) m, MonadState CompileState m, MonadDefs LexName uni fun Ann m, MonadWriter CoverageIndex m)
name: Compiling

display_html: type NameInfo = Map Name TyThing
name: NameInfo

display_html:
data CompileOptions = CompileOptions {
  • coProfile ∷ ProfileOpts
  • coCoverage ∷ CoverageOpts
  • coDatatypeStyle ∷ DatatypeStyle
  • coRemoveTrace ∷ Bool
  • coInlineFix ∷ Bool
}
name: CompileOptions CompileOptions coInlineFix coProfile coCoverage coDatatypeStyle coRemoveTrace

display_html:
data ProfileOpts
  • = All
  • | None
name: ProfileOpts All None

display_html:
data CoverageOpts = CoverageOpts {
  • unCoverageOpts ∷ Set CoverageType
}
name: CoverageOpts CoverageOpts unCoverageOpts

display_html:
data CompileContext uni fun = CompileContext {
  • ccOpts ∷ CompileOptions
  • ccFlags ∷ DynFlags
  • ccFamInstEnvs ∷ FamInstEnvs
  • ccNameInfo ∷ NameInfo
  • ccScope ∷ Scope uni fun
  • ccBlackholed ∷ Set Name
  • ccCurDef ∷ Maybe LexName
  • ccModBreaks ∷ Maybe ModBreaks
  • ccBuiltinsInfo ∷ BuiltinsInfo uni fun
  • ccBuiltinCostModel ∷ CostingPart uni fun
  • ccDebugTraceOn ∷ Bool
  • ccRewriteRules ∷ RewriteRules uni fun
  • ccSafeToInline ∷ Bool
}
name: CompileContext CompileContext ccBuiltinCostModel ccBuiltinsInfo ccOpts ccRewriteRules ccFlags ccFamInstEnvs ccNameInfo ccScope ccBlackholed ccCurDef ccModBreaks ccDebugTraceOn ccSafeToInline

display_html: newtype LexName = LexName Name
name: LexName LexName

display_html:
data CompileState = CompileState {
  • csNextStep ∷ Int
  • csPreviousSteps ∷ [Int]
}
name: CompileState CompileState csNextStep csPreviousSteps

display_html:
data CoverageType
  • = LocationCoverage
  • | BooleanCoverage
name: CoverageType LocationCoverage BooleanCoverage

display_html: type CompilingDefault uni fun m ann = (uni ~ DefaultUni, fun ~ DefaultFun, Compiling uni fun m ann)
name: CompilingDefault

display_html: type OptionKey = Text

name: OptionValue

display_html: data Implication a = ∀ b. Implication (a → Bool) (Lens' PluginOptions b) b
name: Implication Implication

display_html:
data PluginOption = ∀ a.Pretty a ⇒ PluginOption {
  • poTypeRep ∷ TypeRep a
  • poFun ∷ Maybe OptionValue → Validation ParseError (a → a)
  • poLens ∷ Lens' PluginOptions a
  • poDescription ∷ Text
  • poImplications ∷ [Implication a]
}
name: PluginOption poImplications poDescription poLens poFun poTypeRep PluginOption

display_html:
data ParseError
  • = CannotParseValue !OptionKey !OptionValue !SomeTypeRep
  • | UnexpectedValue !OptionKey !OptionValue
  • | MissingValue !OptionKey
  • | UnrecognisedOption !OptionKey ![OptionKey]
name: ParseError UnrecognisedOption MissingValue UnexpectedValue CannotParseValue

display_html: newtype ParseErrors = ParseErrors (NonEmpty ParseError)
